UPDATE `_order` SET
`userid` = #{set.userid},
`orderUserId` = #{set.orderUserId},
`bussinessId` = #{set.bussinessId},
`storesId` = #{set.storesId},
`payPassword` = #{set.payPassword},
`verificationCode` = #{set.verificationCode},
`amount` = #{set.amount},
`totalAmount` = #{set.totalAmount},
`price` = #{set.price},
`totalPrice` = #{set.totalPrice},
`payType` = #{set.payType},
`orderNumber` = #{set.orderNumber},
`serialNumber` = #{set.serialNumber},

`orderType` = #{set.orderType},

`createDateTime` = #{set.createDateTime},
`check_state` = #{set.checkState},
`cash_number` = #{set.cashNumber},
`big_order_number` = #{set.bigOrderNumber},
`id` in
#{item} and
`id` >= #{where.idSt} and
